sentences.sContent: The public has flocked to the show.
sentences.sCn: 公众蜂拥而去看那场演出。

sentences.sContent: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.sCn: 这些批评阻止不了涌向看这部影片的人潮。

remMethod.val: 和block(n. 块； 阻滞； 一批)一起记

trans.tranOther: If people flock to a particular place or event, a very large number of them go there, usually because it is pleasant or interesting
